Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25657 affecting package m2crypto for versions less than 0.38.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-25657 affecting package m2crypto for versions less than 0.38.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package m2crypto is earlier than 0.38.0-3, affected by CVE-2020-25657
